channel.title: Port forward problem
channel.description:
Hi ok i found out my problem with the server was i needed to portforward please dont ask why i didnt know its kinda long story...
ok so i went to portforward and correctly did all parts as the tutorial said and this is what is says as i click save changed...
"You cannot use the Router IP, netwqork or broadcast address"
please help me with this problem or tell me what im doing wrong.
[IMG]http://i668.photobucket.com/albums/vv42/lollollollollol111/portforward.jpg[/img]
